pleaseEnter: Please enter a container group name to search
stopConfirm: Confirm to stop the fine-tuning experiment {finetuneToShop}?
modifyHyperparameterGroup: Modifying the hyperparameter group will override the hyperparameter values of the original group.

StopWorkloadDialog.header: Are you sure you want to stop the fine-tuning experiment {name}?
StopWorkloadDialog.content: Stopping the fine-tuning experiment may result in data loss. Before stopping the workload '{name}', make sure that business data is saved in storage. Once the experiment is stopped, it cannot be restarted.
StopWorkloadDialog.stopSuccess: Stop the fine-tuning experiment {name} task dispatched successfully. Please refresh the fine-tuning experiment list later.
StopWorkloadDialog.stopError: Failed to stop the fine-tuning experiment {name}. Reason:

deleteFineTuningExperimentContent: Are you sure you want to delete the fine-tuning experiment {name}? After removal, the corresponding data will be completely lost and cannot be recovered. Please operate with caution.
